data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Valor And Villainy Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
Stir epic emotions with these ten tracks of orchestral fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler! Powerful themes for valiant heroes and evil antagonists are accompanied by evocative music for their journeys and battles. Let these powerful tracks take you to another time when the sword was mightier than... other things that were not swords.

Features:

* 10 BGM tracks covering battle, dungeon, field, themes, and towns!
* .ogg and .m4a formats included.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
